CustomField.formula: IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'Acknowledgment'), 'Acknowledgment,', null) + IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'Backlog Report'), 'Backlog Report ,', null) + IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'Backlog Report (if data)'), 'Backlog Report (if data),', null) + IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'CERT'), 'CERT,', null) + IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'Packing List'), 'Packing List,', null) + IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'Prior Day Shipments Report'), 'Prior Day Shipments Report ,', null) + IF( INCLUDES(Email_Selections__c, 'Prior Day Shipments Report (if data)'), 'Prior Day Shipments Report (if data),', null)
CustomField.label: Hidden Email Selections
